channel.title: Lock
channel.description:
i saw [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,45906.0.html/]this[/url] and wanted to count down who wanted to un-ban, him [hr] [quote="Mrquarter"]Do you idiots want to know the real reason. This is Mrquarter, the person he framed. It all began here: Me, Flamed Fury1, and Guthan38 are talking on MSN. Me and Guthan38 De-obbed the Runescape Client and were cleaning it up and making it work. We got it all done and we sent it to Flamed Fury1. He said I will fix all that needs to be fixed. The next day, he says to me "here is the client, release it on Moparscape.org but take all credit for you, don't mention my name. I am sick of everybody thinking I know everything and I want you to have credit." If you thought somebody would do that, you are mistaken. I thought it was suspicious but to get to the bottom of it, I decided to post it. I did and a day later, Moparisthebest pmed me saying that I better talk or I am IP Baned. I talked to Mopar and Flamed Fury1 was caught red-handed. He got IP Baned for it and he sort of deserves it. He keylogged everybody and deserves what he got.
That is the real story since I was involved highly. Thank you.
-Mrquarter[/quote] nvm i lock it and w8 for it to get deleted

item.title: Lock
item.dc:creator: @phse phse
item.description:
@phse wrote:

i saw this and wanted to count down who wanted to un-ban, him
[hr]

[quote=“Mrquarter”]Do you idiots want to know the real reason. This is Mrquarter, the person he framed. It all began here:
Me, Flamed Fury1, and Guthan38 are talking on MSN. Me and Guthan38 De-obbed the Runescape Client and were cleaning it up and making it work. We got it all done and we sent it to Flamed Fury1. He said I will fix all that needs to be fixed. The next day, he says to me “here is the client, release it on Moparscape.org but take all credit for you, don’t mention my name. I am sick of everybody thinking I know everything and I want you to have credit.” If you thought somebody would do that, you are mistaken. I thought it was suspicious but to get to the bottom of it, I decided to post it. I did and a day later, Moparisthebest pmed me saying that I better talk or I am IP Baned. I talked to Mopar and Flamed Fury1 was caught red-handed. He got IP Baned for it and he sort of deserves it. He keylogged everybody and deserves what he got.

That is the real story since I was involved highly. Thank you.

-Mrquarter[/quote]
nvm i lock it and w8 for it to get deleted
